callwithbearertoken.name: CallWithBearerToken
callwithbearertoken.description: Grants permission to make API calls using bearer token authentication

cancelfinetuningjob.name: CancelFineTuningJob
cancelfinetuningjob.description: Grants permission to cancel an in-progress fine tuning job

cancelinference.name: CancelInference
cancelinference.description: Grants permission to cancel an in-progress inference request

createfile.name: CreateFile
createfile.description: Grants permission to create a file in a project

createfinetuningjob.name: CreateFineTuningJob
createfinetuningjob.description: Grants permission to create a fine tuning job

createinference.name: CreateInference
createinference.description: Grants permission to create a chat completion inference request

deletefile.name: DeleteFile
deletefile.description: Grants permission to delete a specific file

deleteinference.name: DeleteInference
deleteinference.description: Grants permission to delete a specific inference request

getfile.name: GetFile
getfile.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific file

getfinetuningjob.name: GetFineTuningJob
getfinetuningjob.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a specific fine tuning job

getinference.name: GetInference
getinference.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a specific inference request

getmodel.name: GetModel
getmodel.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific model

listfiles.name: ListFiles
listfiles.description: Grants permission to list all available files in a project

listfinetuningjobs.name: ListFineTuningJobs
listfinetuningjobs.description: Grants permission to list all available fine tuning jobs in a project

listmodels.name: ListModels
listmodels.description: Grants permission to list all available models in a project
